ComicInfo.Title: The Poison Plot; The Purloined Pursuit Plane Plans; The Wall in the Sky; The Venusian Murder Plot; The Trail of the Black Rider; The Forest of Doom; The Return of the Fang; The Land of Peril
ComicInfo.Summary:
1. The Poison Plot (13 pages) - Featuring Samson and David by Alex Blum
2. The Purloined Pursuit Plane Plans (6 pages) - Featuring Yank Wilson by Dennis Neville
3. The Wall In the Sky (6 pages) - Featuring Flip Falcon by "Orville Wells"
4. The Venusian Murder Plot (6 pages) - Featuring Space Smith by "Hank Christy"
5. The Trail of the Black Rider (5 pages) - Featuring Captain Kidd by Bill Bossert
6. The Flight of the Golden Cross (2 pages) - by Nathaniel Nitkin
7. The Forest of Doom (8 pages) - Featuring Golden Knight by Grieg Chapian
8. The Return of the Fang (8 pages) - Featuring Black Fury by Dennis Neville
9. The Land of Peril (7 pages) - Featuring Sub Saunders
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 18:11:38. [Issue ID 1404]
